member.name: T:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationLiterateExtensions
member.summary: Adds the WriteTo.LiterateConsole() extension method to .

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationLiterateExtensions.LiterateConsole(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Nullable{Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel})
member.summary: Writes log events to , using pretty printing to display inline event data.
member.param: The minimum level for events passed through the sink.
A message template describing the format used to write to the sink. the default is "{Timestamp} [{Level}] {Message}{NewLine}{Exception}".
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
Specifies the level at which events will be written to standard error.
